bioAsHtml: Kris Verlaenen is the jBPM project lead at Red Hat. After finishing his PhD in Computer Science in 2008, he joined Red Hat. He has a keen interest in everything related to BPM, and a special interest in the healthcare domain, one of the areas that has already shown to have a great need for flexible business processes.

acceptedTalks.title: Process-driven applications: let BPM do (some of) your work
